alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 19 at 1:47AM CDT until September 19 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Illinois, including the following county, Morgan. * WHEN...Until 345 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 145 AM CDT, Emergency management reported urban street flooding in Jacksonville from thunderstorms. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jacksonville, South Jacksonville and Jacksonville Municipal Airport. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
